reviewText: Nothing is as good as little bear in this day. My 3 yr old grandson really watches and he never sits still for very long!!
This dvd is great for snowy, winter days. Every episode is winter related in some way. The only problem I had was that it took almost 2 1/2 weeks to be delivered to me.
This disc has many of my son's favorite episodes. It is watched, continually.
Great buy, My 2 year old love's this.

I am trying to get all of this set of Little Bear DVDs and this makes the fifth one and I have the sixth on the way. I hope to eventually find the last two, I continue to check on them daily. This is such a great buy, so many episodes on each DVD, this one has twenty. Since no listing of the episodes is available I will list them here.
Polar Bear - A Flu - Little Bear and the North Pole - Snowball Fight - Winter Solstice - Snowbound - Night of the Full Moon - Between Friends - Gingerbread Cookies - Dance Steps - Winter Wonderland - Sleepover - Valentines Day - Little Footprint - Duck Takes the Cake - First Frost - Hello Snow - Duck and the Winter Moon - Sleepyhead Monster - We're Lost

I hope this is helpful to anyone buying this Little Bear DVD. This is certainly a great buy and I am so glad that I ran across the first one.
This set is one of eight sets that just came out, this set includes 20 episodes, and in all 8 sets 171/195 episodes.
